mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mood_records (user_id, date, mood, note, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{date}, #{mood}, #{note}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mood_records WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = false ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE mood_records SET mood = #{mood}, note = #{note}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = false
